abstract: One Police Plaza: Occupied Wall Street's police overtime cost is mounting; protesters seek solidarity with police officers; and the anti-Wall Street campaign has generated more work for the civilian panel that handles complaints of police misconduct.
snippet: One Police Plaza: Occupied Wall Street's police overtime cost is mounting; protesters seek solidarity with police officers; and the anti-Wall Street campaign has generated more work for the civilian panel that handles complaints of police misconduct.
lead_paragraph: The cost of policing the ongoing demonstrations by Occupy Wall Street is mounting, according to Police Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly.

headline.main: Overtime, Solidarity and Complaints in Wall St. Protests
